attributes.action: REWARD LUCY CARRICK FOR 30 YEARS OF DEDICATION TO EDUCATION.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For thirty years Lucy Carrick has been a teacher in Brentwood, Essex.She has been Head of the Art Dept in St Martins School for over 25 tears.She has thought 3 generations of families in the area.Lucy is 60 in February 2009 and could retire then, but has agreed with the school to carry on till the end of the year to ensure that she oversees the a level exams.
She has never had an "A level student" fail in all her time at St Martins.
Lucy is totally dedicated to her job and is a fantastic teacher.She is held in very high esteem by all her colligues.Perents have stopped Lucy
in the street on many occasions, and have broke down telling Lucy that she saved thier childs life by getting them into University and away from bad company,or changing thier direction in life.
Something very moving to witness.
It would be right and fitting if she was Rewarded in some small way.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
